 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱלִיל‎</span> **noun masculine** (etymology uncertain: most probably akin to Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***weak, feeble, poor***; perhaps also in usage [compare **b**] ==felt to suggest== <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַל‎</span> ***not***; compare [[BDB#Che|Che]] on [[Isa.2.8|Isa 2:8]]) ***insufficiency, worthlessness***. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** [[Zech.11.17|Zech 11:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעִי הָאֱלִיל‎</span> the shepherd of ***worthlessness*** = the worthless shepherd, [[Job.13.4|Job 13:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹפְאֵי אֱלִל‎</span> ***worthless*** physicians (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טֹפְלֵישֶֿׁקֶר‎</span>), [[Jer.14.14|Jer 14:14]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] concrete ***a thing nought*** (uttered by prophets), but here <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶסֶם אֱלִיל‎</span> ***a worthless*** divin. (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲזוֺן שֶׁקֶר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּרְמִית לִבָּם‎</span>) should perhaps be read (compare [[BDB#Gf|Gf]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** especially plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱלִילִים‎</span> concrete ***worthless gods, idols*** (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲבָלִים‎</span>) (***possibly*** originally an independent word = ***gods***, compare Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אלאלת‎</span>, &amp; see [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>SBAk 1882, p. 1191</sup>, but even if so, associated by the prophets with idea of worthlessness, &amp; used by them in iron. contrast with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵלִים‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱלֹהִים‎</span>) [[Lev.19.4|Lev 19:4]] (not to be ***made***) [[Lev.26.1|Lev 26:1]] (both [[BDB#H|H]]), [[Isa.2.8|Isa 2:8]]; [[Isa.2.18|Isa 2:18]]; [[Isa.2.20|Isa 2:20]] (twice in verse) (of silver &amp; gold), [[Isa.10.10|Isa 10:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַמְלְכוֺת הָאֱלִיל‎</span> (collective) kingdoms of ***idolatrous worthlessness***, v[[Isa.10.11|Isa 10:11]]; [[Isa.19.1|Isa 19:1]]; [[Isa.19.3|Isa 19:3]] (of Egypt) [[Isa.31.7|Isa 31:7]] (twice in verse); [[Ezek.30.13|Ezek 30:13]] (Egypt), [[Hab.2.18|Hab 2:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִלְּמִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> ***dumb*** idols, [[Ps.96.5|Ps 96:5]] ( = [[1Chr.16.26|1Chr 16:26]]) all the gods of the nations are <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> ***vain, worthless gods*** [[1Chr.97.7|1Chr 97:7]].
